name: NeuroClone
description:
NeuroClone is a first-person platformer à la Portal where  the player must traverse several courses and either listen to, or escape, an ever-present AI. It was created in 7 days for the N8Jam and by one developer, Critical Kunic (me!).

Controls

Standard FPS controls:

  • Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
  • Look: Mouse
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Jump: Space
  • Respawn: R
Features
  • 3 Endings
  • Several secrets to discover
  • 5-15 story-mode depending on ending and personal skill in first person platforming
  • A "Speedrun" mode which disables cutscenes and adds a timer down to the millisecond
Acclaims

Friend, beta tester, and veteran gamer Zydein described a feature as "I'm not sure if it's just hard or a bug" and later followed up with "yeah it's just hard."
